Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns.TokenPatternMatch

  • Packages that use TokenPatternMatch 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features
    Features specific to the tokenisation phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.

    • Uses of TokenPatternMatch in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
